Design

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Design.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller where the tetris viewBoard and GameLogic of tetris are called This is the class that that make changes to the model and the view, based on user input and the timer
    Version:
    10/10/2017
    Author:
    Ioanna Deni

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int score 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      The constructor of the class that calls and updates the GameLogic and ViewBoard class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkRow()
      Checks if any row is filled saves it in toRow array and in the copiedGrid it saves all the pieces above it then it removes the toRow and copies the copiedGrid one row bellow updates the ViewBoard
      void endGame()
      Checks if the copiedGrid has height bigger than the one of the board border so finishes the game and starts another one updates the ViewBoard
      void keyTyped()
      Method required for getting input from the user and changing the GameLogic model accordingly and updating the ViewBoard newBoard after checking if the input is valid (doesn’t exit the board borders)
      void run()
      Handles changes after our timer has been set in motion so if no user input then the piece moves one line every unit of time till it gets to the bottom of the board or hit another piece
      void updateScore()
      Updates the score when the checkRow methods returns a new board updates the ViewBoard

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Method required for getting input from the user and changing the GameLogic model accordingly and updating the ViewBoard newBoard after checking if the input is valid (doesn’t exit the board borders)

      • run

        public void run()
        Handles changes after our timer has been set in motion so if no user input then the piece moves one line every unit of time till it gets to the bottom of the board or hit another piece

      • checkRow

        public void checkRow()
        Checks if any row is filled saves it in toRow array and in the copiedGrid it saves all the pieces above it then it removes the toRow and copies the copiedGrid one row bellow updates the ViewBoard

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Checks if the copiedGrid has height bigger than the one of the board border so finishes the game and starts another one updates the ViewBoard

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore()
        Updates the score when the checkRow methods returns a new board updates the ViewBoard
